Text: As you evolve so do weHpst Dear RedHerringcom Newsletter Subscriber You already know RED HERRING as a trusted source for indepth analysis on the technology and business innovations that shape the global economy Since weve been the leader in providing this information and now as we prepare to publish our th issue its about to get even better Click here to get a FREE TRIAL COPY of ISSUE and reserve or renew your subscription to RED HERRING for oneyear at the lowest available rate circulationasplayoutcirculationuskeyidEA On July th we introduce a fresh look that reflects the maturity and progressive coverage of RED HERRING The redesign will offer easier navigation tools more informationintensive tables and graphs reformatted feature packages and much more all intended to help readers get the most out of each issue But please hurry You must respond by June to guarantee delivery of this special issue Do it today its riskfree To get your FREE TRIAL COPY of our th issue and reserve or renew your subscription to RED HERRING for oneyear at the lowest available rate just click here circulationasplayoutcirculationuskeyidEA Sincerely Thea Selby Circulation Director PS We hope you dont mind getting this message However if youd rather not receive special offers from Red Herring please reply to this email with unsubscribe in the subject line or visit wwwredherringcommail
